nodeList.name: World Pose
nodeList.description: Get the world space position, rotation, and scale of a Transform component.

owner.name: Split
owner.description: Unpack a vector or color data into separate output values. The number of outputs depends on the selected data type. Supported types: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

owner.name: Subtract
owner.description: Subtract one value by another. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, and Vec4.

owner.name: Add
owner.description: Calculate the sum of two inputs. You can click "+" to add more inputs. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

owner.name: Combine
owner.description: Pack inputs into a vector or color data. The number of inputs depends on the selected data type. And the outputs are in the same order as they were inputted. Supported types: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

owner.name: Subtract
owner.description: Subtract one value by another. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, and Vec4.

owner.name: Multiply
owner.description: Multiply two values. You can click "+" to add more inputs. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, and Vec4.

owner.name: World to Screen
owner.description: Transform a position from world space to camera viewport space. The bottom left of the camera viewport is (0,0) and the top right is (1,1).

owner.name: World to Screen
owner.description: Transform a position from world space to camera viewport space. The bottom left of the camera viewport is (0,0) and the top right is (1,1).

owner.name: Peek
owner.description: Monitor and display the value of the input in real time, or output the value to another node. Supported types: Number, Bool, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, Color, String, and Rect.

owner.name: Screen Tap
owner.description: Execute the next node when the device screen is tapped. It triggers as soon as the finger touches the screen.
